title: Sr. RFIC Design Engineer
summary: The Wireless SoC Radio Team designs state-of-art highly energy efficient CMOS radios, from RF to bits. As an RFIC design engineer, you will be at the center of this wireless SoC design group.
description: As a RF IC design engineer, you will be a key member of a small RFIC team, researching, designing and bringing the next-generation of wireless technologies into high-volume production in advanced CMOS technology nodes.
key_qualifications: BS and 10+ years of relevant industry experience. Strong knowledge of RFIC circuit design. Deep understanding of analog design concepts. Knowledge of CMOS device physics. Insights into packaging effects. Familiarity with various RF transceiver architectures. Exposure with Cadence Virtuoso. Experience in Si characterization.
education_experience: BS and 10+ years of relevant industry experience
